website_summaries.verdict: Dino-loving kids will dig this set full of dinosaur figures and fossil molds. Keep in mind that this brand's texture is coarser and drier than most.
pros: of sand, 10 shaping molds, and 12 sea creature figures
Packaging doubles as sandbox and toys
Texture is more coarse and dry  than other brands
cons: Not enough sand included to fill the box or play with many of the molds

customer_reviews.title: Nice set for the money.
customer_reviews.text: Great kit for the money! I recommend buying a 2lb refill bag of sand when you buy it as the bag that comes with it doesn’t really fill up the tray. It was low mess and had lots of dinosaur accessories. The only negative is that the dinosaur “fossil” arrived completely broken into hundreds of tiny sharp pieces. Even if it hadn’t been broken the pieces would have probably been dangerous. I’d toss the fossil parts because they’ll fall apart in the sand and poke your kid the first time they try to dig for them. Other than that, the set is pretty rad and my kid loves it!
customer_reviews.author: RKD MOM

customer_reviews.title: Best Kinetic Sand I've Found!
customer_reviews.text: I MUCH prefer Cool Sand over the other leading brand. What I love about this sand is that there isn't a nasty odor like others we've tried. The color is a beautiful light brown and it's very soft. The molds and bones are a perfect addition!
customer_reviews.author: Julia M.

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves dinosaurs and sand, so this is perfect for her. She can spend up to an hour playing with it. Which is amazing because she never sits still for more than 10 minutes. Most of the reviews say there is no mess, this is not really accurate. There is always a mess but it is easy to clean up. My kid is only 3 so maybe with older kids it is less messy. I would definitely buy this again and will most likely be buying more sand for it soon.
customer_reviews.author: Lori Shoemaker

customer_reviews.title: still LOVES the sand.
customer_reviews.text: My 5 yr old grandson just loves this sand. No worries about drying out and it’s very moldable. He enjoys the dinosaurs but also puts in his small construction trucks in the box and will play for an hour, that’s amazing! Very few toys will keep his attention for this long in peaceful play. Any sand that falls on our wood floor is swept up easily, and replacement sand is not that expensive. He’s had his cool sand for about a year now and enjoys as much now as a year ago. We just bought another for a birthday gift.
customer_reviews.author: Gma

customer_reviews.title: This stuff is great! I got it for my kid's 4th birthday ...
customer_reviews.text: This stuff is great! I got it for my kid's 4th birthday and he has played with it daily for hours. He likes to hide things in the sand and other toys come and find what's hidden. I've had to tell my 4 year old to keep the sand in the box and he does, for the most part. Whatever ends up on the floor is easy to clean. He loves it, I love it. Great product and recommend for small kids.
customer_reviews.author: Sheri

customer_reviews.title: Kept my 3yo daughter entertained for over an hour!
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loses focus fast and flits from toy drawer to toy drawer dumping everything out looking for the perfect thing to play with (truly playing with nothing long). She sat at our kitchen table for over an hour happily burying and digging up the dino bones. The sand is just as nice as the famous brand’s, and the dinosaurs and bones really make the set. I am planning to suplement wih more sand, but this was plenty for her to play with right out of the box. Cleanup isn’t bad at all and was similar to playdoh...gather up what you can and suck up the little bits left.
customer_reviews.author: Erin Miller

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Big hit with the kiddo! I'll probably be ordering another pack of sand if I can
customer_reviews.author: Corey

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely great toy for both kids and adults to enjoy
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely great toy for both kids and adults to enjoy. My daughter and I have played on this sandbox many times always finding new and creative ideas to do. The molds and figures that come with it add a nice touch to the play and the little bones can be used as a treasure hunt. The sand is not messy and usually pretty hassle free to clean up. Every time other little kids come to the house they get caught up with this entertaining set. I have recommended it to both friends and family.
customer_reviews.author: Luis GTZ

customer_reviews.title: Easy to clean, great for sensory play!
customer_reviews.text: When the tiny men requested this, I thought there'd be sand everywhere. That said, yes, sand does kind of get everywhere but it's that kind of wettish sand that's super easy to pick up so no big deal at all. I love how it's self containing in its little, easy to store box (YES! A rectangular storage box instead of another annoying round container that doesn't fit anywhere) and how the kids can use the box like a mini sandbox to play with it. They don't really use the little plastic trees but they play with the dinos all.the.time!
customer_reviews.author: Chicago Kelley

customer_reviews.title: A great long term investment!
customer_reviews.text: I have two grandsons: 9 and 4. When my eldest grandson was 3 I first bought him the play sand (kinetic sand) and he was always playing with it. We would make "dirt bike" race tracks, etc. It was beyond easy to clean up and can I tell you that it is the same kinetic sand that my youngest plays with today!! These kits I recently purchased were to add colors and new fun toys, like dinosaurs. This is a great investment, it lasts a very long time and I recommend it!
customer_reviews.author: Redwoman

customer_reviews.title: Fun for everyone
customer_reviews.text: This product is so dumb. The included "toys" look like they came from entirely different toy sets. It almost boggles my mind that the reviews on this or so good. Yes yes, I know, 4 out of 5. Yeah, because I gave this to my coworker, that loveeeeeeeees dinosaurs, and he lost his mind. He promptly pointed out the seemingly mismatched dino toys, but then had a blast playing with it, and so did half the office. The sand is cool, and I honestly didn't realize it'd be like that. For kids, or adults that didn't forget how to kid, it's a pretty good little product.
customer_reviews.author: J. Harvey

customer_reviews.title: You will need more sand
customer_reviews.text: I like everything that I got its a good size for my desk and a nice conversation starter, but you will need more sand. They provided one pound, which fills about a quarter of the box to the halfway point. This being said, you'll need about another 3 pounds of kinetic sand to really enjoy this. I would give it 5 stars if it came with a usable amount of sand.
customer_reviews.author: Kendra W.

customer_reviews.title: Mehhh.....
customer_reviews.text: In hindsight, I'd repurchase a 3lb bag of kinetic sand some dollar store animals instead of this set. It's OK if you're looking for a gift for a young one who enjoys playing in a sandbox, but the materials themselves are cheap. The kinetic sand isn't the best quality; very hard and crumbly. My kids still enjoy playing with this but I wouldn't purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: ThatGirlCTop Contributor: Baby

customer_reviews.title: Cool product - keeps son's attention
customer_reviews.text: This works JUST like it says. The sand feels just like wet beach sand but without the mess. My 3 year old son, who never sits with one toy for more than the time it took to get the toy out, is entertained by this for a good 30-40 minutes at a time. Lots of cool little accessories with it. I would definitely buy this again - looking forward to maybe doing so as gifts for others.
customer_reviews.author: oconnorsrb

customer_reviews.title: Very easy to clean!
customer_reviews.text: I have a 3 year old and a 5 year old and they both went crazy over it even though it was purchased for the younger of the two. They played for hours and forgot to ask for snacks 13 times. Lol. They buried the "bones", stomped around with the tiny dino figures and loved making the little molds over and over. Clean up was very easy, would highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca McAllister

customer_reviews.title: Great gift for a dinosaur lover
customer_reviews.text: My son loves this set. He plays with it everyday. He really wanted a sandbox, but our neighborhood is full of cats. I bought him this instead and he has not asked for a sandbox since. He is a little young for the set so we have a problem with him keeping the sand in the box, but overall, it’s a great purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fun for everyone!
customer_reviews.text: So I had originally bought this for a birthday present for my daughter but the hubby and I were too impatient. We wanted to play with it too. My daughter loves it, she loves the dinosaur pieces and she always brings the box to us so she can play. Super nice and we'll worth every penny ^.^
customer_reviews.author: Mimi

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: This was for my 3 yr old grandson, who really liked it -- I did get the extra sand that was suggested by others, which isn't necessary but does give much more sand than what came with it. This is fun gift, I would recommend to anyone with young children.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: As advertised!
customer_reviews.text: This sand box was for my grandson who is currently obsessed with all things “dinosaur”. He was thrilled and it has kept his interest for quite some time. So speaking from that perspective i have to say we are both very pleased with this item and his Mother thanks you as well. Also the quality of the product is extremely high quality and durable. Very pleased with my purchase
customer_reviews.author: jane sandt

customer_reviews.title: A fun set for imaginary and creative play
customer_reviews.text: There are all sorts of dino figures and are great for setting up the story. The figures are small enough for little hands to hold and manipulate. The red palm trees are great for creating scenery and background. We threw away the dino fossils due to safety concern of broken pieces. Highly recommend this sandbox.
customer_reviews.author: Athena C

customer_reviews.title: Grandson loved it.
customer_reviews.text: I wanted something fun for our 3 year old grandson to do when visiting other than the usual cars and trucks.The kinetic sand was ideal as it incorprated texture sensation as well as the fun of digging and finding the Dino's. Though the box is quite sturdy and will accommodate playing with the sand, we chose to add a cookie sheet also.The sand sweeps up easily and stores well back into it's bag.The kinetic sand arrived on schedule This made an excellent gift!
customer_reviews.author: David A. Kuure

customer_reviews.title: Our favorite activity
customer_reviews.text: We bought this and an extra bag of sand for our 5 year old son for Christmas. It's been such a great activity that keeps him occupied for a couple hours at a time which is saying something because I'm writing this review at the start of March. He has so many dinosaurs that he loves playing with in the sandbox and the fact that the sand doesn't get messy makes clean up a breeze. Will definitely buy again. Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: GMC

customer_reviews.title: So fun to play with!
customer_reviews.text: My son really loves this. He's been really wanting kinetic type sand and when I saw this dino one I knew he would love it and he does!! My only thing is the sand seemed a little dry which is expected on the paper it comes with it instructs you use a spray bottle to wet it but up over the sand to must it so to speak and that worked perfectly!! Easy to clean as well
customer_reviews.author: Kaytarra Correa

customer_reviews.title: Great product, fun, and engaging.
customer_reviews.text: My 3.5 year old loves this kit. Keeps him busy for at least 1 hour everytime. He loves digging for the bones and making shapes. The only thing is he wishes the bones could be put together to make the dinosaurs skeleton, but other than that, he loves it. I love that it has a nice easy container for the sand to be put in for playing and that everything has it's own bag for organized clean up. Definitely would recommend if your little one loves to play with sand while being engaged finding/making dinosaurs.
customer_reviews.author: Elaine R.

customer_reviews.title: A little bit less sand than I thought
customer_reviews.text: Which could be my fault. I normally research my stuff. This just seemed like something my kiddo would like becuase it has sand, dinosaurs, digging, you know-all of his favorite things. He probably just needed to be a little bit older. But, the box contains less sand than I had hoped, although I know you can purchase more and add.
customer_reviews.author: Teacher Lady

customer_reviews.title: Good for price, but need additional sand
customer_reviews.text: This little box set is cute and fun. My five year old played with it for a while, but has never asked to play with it since. He loves dinosaurs. I would recommend to buy additional CoolSand. Unfortunately, I’m unable to find some in a similar cool, so I have not made the additional purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Mrs. Sweet

customer_reviews.title: Easy to clean up.
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my 3 year old son and I love it!! This is just the greatest stuff ever invented!! I have ordered more since this box in order to fill up a sweater tote so he can play with his trucks in it. It is super easy to clean up and it doesn’t stick to the clothes and hands. Unless they are wet. We love it!!
customer_reviews.author: Laura B.

customer_reviews.title: Great "sand" alternative for indoor play
customer_reviews.text: My kid really enjoyed this and I enjoyed the mess-free playing it provided. The "sand" really does clean up easily. My kiddo enjoyed making towers and burying treasure. My only complaint was the amount of "sand" was minimal, and I'd buy another sand pack for optimal sand-toy ratio and play.
customer_reviews.author: E

customer_reviews.title: It’s okay
customer_reviews.text: The sand part its self was great! The only thing I’m really disappointed about is the Dino fossils this kit comes with. The pieces were so behind tiny. I gave this as a gift and the Dino fossils were already broken before he even had a chance to play with it.
customer_reviews.author: Melinda Rivera

customer_reviews.title: Malachi Loves It!
customer_reviews.text: My son is a huge dinosaur fan. He has created palm trees and scenes for his dinosaurs to stomp around in. He’s even buried the fossils and made discoveries. I love that it grows his imagination while fostering his love for dinosaurs. The sand does sometimes get a little hard but there are instructions for how to get it back to normal consistency that works well. I love it and recommend it to all dinosaur lovers!
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie

customer_reviews.title: Looks super cool
customer_reviews.text: Full disclosure, we haven't actually played with this yet, as I purchased it on Prime Day for my son's birthday in October. He is crazy for dinosaurs and I know he is going to love it. The packaging looked great, too. I will update when he actually plays with it.
customer_reviews.author: Kristin Cobaugh

customer_reviews.title: Fun
customer_reviews.text: My little one loves this set. It has sand and little dinosaurs. If you do not like messes then you will not like this. The sand is not bad to clean up, not typical sand it doesn't stay around forever lol
customer_reviews.author: Ang Fong

customer_reviews.title: Makes a great gift
customer_reviews.text: Cute sandbox. Nice that it is all in one. Gave as a gift so idk the actual quality of the Dino’s ... but if what’s inside is anything like the box quality outside it should be fine. Often that’s kind of no name brands have cheap construction but this box is well made and seems like it will hold the sand and toys well over time.
customer_reviews.author: Demsthebreaks

customer_reviews.title: My Son Loves This Kit
customer_reviews.text: Great purchase! My 7yo son is very tactile, loves CoolSand and loves dinosaurs. This was the perfect gift for him. We've had it for about a month now and he plays with it every single day. The sand has not dried out at all and the pieces have been very durable.
customer_reviews.author: Illinois Momo

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful Sandbox!
customer_reviews.text: This is just the cutest little sandbox! I'm so glad I purchased it. My 3 year old grandson loves it! He loves dinosaurs so this was perfect! It comes with real like sand which is easy to play. Item also arrived promptly and professionally!
customer_reviews.author: Irene Avila

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic
customer_reviews.text: My 4 year old, almost 5 year old, grandson loves this. The box is perfect and the sand is great. It molds perfectly, doesn’t stick and feels and looks just like wet beach sand. The figures add to the fun and kids use their imagination and can create whatever they want.
customer_reviews.author: N. Berdie

customer_reviews.title: Sand is not as smooth as expected
customer_reviews.text: Grandsons like this set and enjoy playing with dinasours in the sand. But I am disappointed that the sand is grainy and lumpy. Not as smooth, soft or as easy to form as other sets I purchased for them. But they like it anyway.
customer_reviews.author: Joyce H

customer_reviews.title: Great product, not messy! Hours of fun!
customer_reviews.text: My almost 3 yr old son loves this! I love that it’s tactile and low mess. He can play on his own or with someone else. He loves searching for the fossils in the sand. There are lots of dinosaurs and pieces to play with which is great! Would definitely recommend this product and actually have already to some friends!
customer_reviews.author: Dr. S. Burns

customer_reviews.title: Great for toddlers who like dinos
customer_reviews.text: Actually very easy to clean up comes with lots of molds and little extra things like plastic bones for them to find in the sand . My son is four and No problems at all he loves it .
customer_reviews.author: Jaclyn Elrod

customer_reviews.title: Worth it
customer_reviews.text: My Son played with this every day for at least 2 months.. after Some weeks the sand was done and i bought him a New pack of the real kenetic sand.. when he was tired of it i put it away for 3 months and now i pulled it back out, he’s playing every day again..
customer_reviews.author: lizi

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.text: This is my sons favorite thing to play with! He’s 2 and absolutely loves this! He loves to bury the bones in the sand and then find them. The same is great quality and hasn’t dried out at all. Love it!
customer_reviews.author: Rachel1211

customer_reviews.title: It was a hit!
customer_reviews.text: Product arrived on time and was just as described. This was gift for my 3 year old nephew who LOVES dinosaurs and also digging in the dirt, so this was the perfect combination. He loved it!
customer_reviews.author: Jacquie

customer_reviews.title: Great activity!
customer_reviews.text: My 3 year old twin granddaughters love burying and digging up the dinosaurs and their bones. Their mother was pleasantly surprised the the sand is more like play doh and stays in the box. A win win for everyone. this would make a great present for any young child that loves dinosaurs!
customer_reviews.author: Lee G

customer_reviews.title: Hours of Fun!
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this for a stocking-stuffer for our 2 year old. He plays with his tractors and dinosaurs in it for hours, even more than the $100 toys! Best $10.00 spent.
customer_reviews.author: Tiffany Preister

customer_reviews.title: Dino's are a favorite for a 4 year old
customer_reviews.text: 100% on the extras in making this product unique. The sand is a little course to touch compared to kinectic sand. A little dryer as well. The cool sand is workable. I would not buy two different sands at the same time. The company did an excellent job in shipping and asking for sincere opinions.
customer_reviews.author: Barbara

customer_reviews.title: Very entertaining!
customer_reviews.text: My Grandson was super entertained with this gift! LOVED it! Kept him busy for hours! Love that it was to put away as well! (For my Daughter) Great Gift idea!
customer_reviews.author: ymetz

customer_reviews.title: Buy the name brand
customer_reviews.text: Sand is dry, but sticks to your hands. The fossil looked like it had melted in the hot sun. The dinosaurs were okay for what you pay for the playset. Recommend? No.
customer_reviews.author: Heather B.

customer_reviews.title: dino-mite!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great product! My nephew absolutely loves it! Keeps him busy for quite a while. Dinosaurs are colorful and perfect size for little hands. Will purchase the other CoolSand 3D sand boxes. You will not regret buying this product!
customer_reviews.author: wisconsin

customer_reviews.title: Fun for dino lovers
customer_reviews.text: My little one loves dinosaurs and sand so this is perfect. Plays with this forever. I can cook dinner after I set this playset down. We like that it comes with molds and dunisaurs to bury. We use little digger sticks (not included) to dig them out!
customer_reviews.author: E Mom

customer_reviews.title: Excelent!!
customer_reviews.text: This is great!! Is the 2nd I bought, the first one I bought it like 3 years ago.. for my 5 year old.. this new one is for my 2nd baby!! They loved them!!!
customer_reviews.author: J.O

customer_reviews.title: Needs more sand
customer_reviews.text: Super fun but needs more sand. Which we will buy more or but wish I would Have know that when we first opened up to play with it
customer_reviews.author: twinmama

customer_reviews.title: Really nice playset
customer_reviews.text: My son loves dinosaurs and kinetic sand. This was such a great find. It had the best of both worlds also it stays in the box for play and stores away in the same box. Very convenient and super cute my son loves it! The sand molds well and yet it’s soft and my son was amazed playing with it. Great price great buy
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth

customer_reviews.title: I highly recommend this play set for everyone...
customer_reviews.text: I have 15 grandkids and they all love dinosaurs, so as you came imagine they all were so happy when they saw that I got this set for them. Oh, I need to say they all love kinetic sad too. They can play in the sand for hours and now with dinosaurs, wow, this is the most fun ever. I do highly recommend this play fun for everyone.
customer_reviews.author: Lamont Hislop

customer_reviews.title: Dry
customer_reviews.text: The sand came a little dry. I've had kinetic sand in the past and I've noticed this batch is a little harder and not as soft. My kids still loved it still able to play. The cookie cutters and the dinosaurs were definitely a bonus.
customer_reviews.author: Vanessa

customer_reviews.title: Great for kids and kids at heart
customer_reviews.text: I use my cool sand 3D sand box all the time with my cute little clients as early intervention speech therapist. The kids love love love playing with the sand and dinosaur molds. It is literally a staple in my therapy kit and a great way to keep your little ones engaged and learning. Great for Sensory stimulation seeking kids. My 31 year old boyfriend also loves playing with my 3D cool sand kit. Great pic for real kids and kids at heart!
customer_reviews.author: Lauren Hamrick

customer_reviews.title: Love
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my son for Christmas and what can I say, I catch myself playing with it. The sand is not sticky which I looovvveeee and it very easy to clean up if it come out of the box. I love it and most important he loves it. I would buy more of this brand n recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Shanelle

customer_reviews.title: I am familiar with kinetic sand - which I absolutely love!! It is great for building fine motor ...
customer_reviews.text: As a Kindergarten teacher, I am familiar with kinetic sand - which I absolutely love!! It is great for building fine motor skills, and the kids enjoy playing with it so much. I ordered this for a Christmas gift for my nephew, who is really into dinosaurs - so it is the perfect gift - I can't wait to give it to him. I received it quickly and highly recommend this shop!
customer_reviews.author: Jill Beaullieu

customer_reviews.title: High quality toy for 3 year old
customer_reviews.text: Awesome toy. The kinetic sand is really fun and there are three different kind of dinosaur toys to play with in the sand. My 3 year son likes digging for the dino bones the most. I especially love that it is all contained in it's own box so the sand doesn't really make a big ness.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole Notario-risk

customer_reviews.title: My son loves it
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my sons 6th birthday and he loves it. The sand doesn't dry out and you can play with it in the box it comes in and then put the lid on and put it away. It is a hit! I would purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: so many books...

customer_reviews.title: Just buy the real stuff instead
customer_reviews.text: Bought as a gift and the sand was all dried out and powdery. Could not be used and our son was so upset. Had to turn around and purchase kinetic sand and he wanted to keep the dinos from this kit. Really disappointed and very upset that our son was.
customer_reviews.author: ABenn

customer_reviews.title: Keeps my 3yo occupied
customer_reviews.text: We gave this to our 3yo son for Christmas. He loves playing with the dinosaurs and making shapes. Currently, his favorite is to have me hide the fossils in the sand and then go on a "dig" to find them. I enjoy the fact that he'll play with it for an hour while I cook or clean up around the house.
customer_reviews.author: ljmwc05

customer_reviews.title: ... dino 3d sand box for my toddler class they love it I am going to buy one for my ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought the dino 3d sand box for my toddler class they love it I am going to buy one for my granddaughter for her birthday she will love it we are studying Dinosaurs had this helps them with learning about them, they really loved digging the bones up in the sand.
customer_reviews.author: Timothy A. Sopko

customer_reviews.title: Great toy for little kids!
customer_reviews.text: Blught it for my 3 yr old and he loves it. I see some people complained about sand going into the openings of the box...to me is very minimal and its ok. Mi child loves it and plays with it every day
customer_reviews.author: Dulce

customer_reviews.title: A little bigger would be nicer
customer_reviews.text: Bought it for 10 year old grandson with autism but he didn't seem interested. His 11 year old brother really liked but did not want to use the little dinosaurs.He used his own action figures instead.
customer_reviews.author: JLR

customer_reviews.title: its okay
customer_reviews.text: I go this set for my son for Xmas he has played with it maybe twice since then... first of all I had to order extra sand since it doesn't come with enough to fill the box, secondly the sand is super DRY! even after wetting it..
customer_reviews.author: KROD

customer_reviews.title: Awful product
customer_reviews.text: Wish I could do 0 stars. Sand bag was open and sand filled with long black hairs. Was a gift to my grandson and had to throw it out. Disgusting.
customer_reviews.author: deborah damman

customer_reviews.title: Fun and educational!
customer_reviews.text: We LOVE this. My little boy plays with it EVERY DAY! The dinosaurs included are great and the sand is fun to work with. If it gets a little dry you simply spray water Above it (not directly into it) like stated in the instructions. Great gift too! We purchased another for a nephew.
customer_reviews.author: Brittney Mitchell

customer_reviews.title: Love the sand, not the toys
customer_reviews.text: The dinosaurs are kind of small so I didnt like the toys but I love the sand. The sand is very easy to clean up and doesnt leave a mess.
customer_reviews.author: Zoe Rodriguez

customer_reviews.title: son loves it!
customer_reviews.text: my son absolutely loved this! he recieved it for his birthday and although got multiple other toys, he played with this more than anything else. I did purchase an extra bag of sand because it doesnt come with much but it's amazing and keeps my son entertained forever!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Okay present.
customer_reviews.text: My son loved this! The only thing was it didn’t come with a lot of sand. I’ll be buying sand separately soon. Also the container to use is just cardboard so I’d get a plastic one to better contain the sand. All in all he was happy digging up his dinosaurs.
customer_reviews.author: Book Boyfriend Whoarder Mari

customer_reviews.title: LOVE THIS
customer_reviews.text: My almost 3 year old daughter is obsessed with dinosaurs and she LOVES this! She plays with it every day... the sand doesn’t make a huge mess and it comes with the dinosaurs and some fossils... absolutely love!
customer_reviews.author: Breonna

customer_reviews.title: cute product - dry kinetic sand
customer_reviews.text: My nephew liked the dino cutouts, but was disappointed by the very dry kinetic sand it came with. The directions said to mist the sand with water as needed ..... not much of an improvement
customer_reviews.author: susie

customer_reviews.title: Great toy to occupy toddlers
customer_reviews.text: Perfect to keep my 4 year old occupied on these cold winter days while we are stuck inside. Decent amount of sand and he loves the plastic dinosaurs. Love that it stays right in the box when he’s done-just put the lid on-no clean up necessary!
customer_reviews.author: Nicole

customer_reviews.title: My son had a blast!
customer_reviews.text: My son loved playing with the dinosaur toys in the sand. Not as messy as beach sand, but less "sticky" than playdoh. Small amount of vacuuming needed for clean up -- but worth the fun for sure!
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Lee

customer_reviews.title: Box set good. Actual sand bad.
customer_reviews.text: The box set is fun. Lots of pieces for Dino lovers. The box keeps the play area in one spot. The actual sand was hard and not really usable. Good thing I ordered more to fill the box after reading the reviews that their was not enough.
customer_reviews.author: Suzanne

customer_reviews.title: Loads of fun without all the mess
customer_reviews.text: Loved this set good price and the sand is super cool doesn't make a mess but is awesome to create things with my 7 year and 13 year old enjoyed playing with this much better then messy slime!
customer_reviews.author: C. Naylor

customer_reviews.title: Our 4 year old grandson plays for long periods of ...
customer_reviews.text: Our 4 year old grandson plays for long periods of time with this "sand box". It can still get sprayed/thrown around, but is much easier to clean up. His imagination goes wild with the dinosaurs included, including the dino bones. A huge hit!
customer_reviews.author: SLG

customer_reviews.title: Fun for girls as well as boys
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to keep at my house for when my granddaughter visits. Most toys don't keep her interest for very long. I was really impressed by how entertained she was by this kit. She loved the sand and she also loved the dinosaurs. I plan to get more. I usually get her very girly toys. I think she enjoyed taking a break from "girl toys".
customer_reviews.author: Lilly

customer_reviews.title: but for my 3yo t was the perfect amount. Eventually the sand ended up all over ...
customer_reviews.text: 1lb of Sand isn’t a lot, but for my 3yo t was the perfect amount. Eventually the sand ended up all over the house, but he thoroughly enjoyed this when we first got it and played with it for many many hours! It’s worth it for one kid.
customer_reviews.author: Ruth

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: We have had this a while. We use it every so often and it’s still good to use, kids love it.
customer_reviews.author: Carlsburg

customer_reviews.title: Fun for hours
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for our daughter who is supposed to share with her younger brother and it worked! Plenty of fun low on the messy scale. Kids are happy = parents happy and able to do chores, cook, and do laundry in the process.
customer_reviews.author: Glen

customer_reviews.title: Encourages creativity.
customer_reviews.text: When I asked my 3 and 6 year old grandsons what they thought about their CoolSand Dino gift, their answer was, "We love it". The 6 year old loves dinosaurs and has enjoyed creating different scenes with the shaping molds and Dino figures.. The 3 year old likes to hide the pieces in the sand and then "dig them up" like a paleontologist. Bonus: It really is the best sand around.
customer_reviews.author: Brenda DiCristina

customer_reviews.title: Great gift
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to bribe my 2 y.o. great nephew with- I was babysitting him for the first time and I knew he would cry when his mama left. We had the best time and he took it home when they left. He now plays with it all the time! And I’m his favorite great aunt. 😂
customer_reviews.author: Sandra Cole

customer_reviews.title: Great toy!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my 3 year old son for Christmas, out of all his gifts this was by far his favorite, he loved the kinetic sand and fossils that he had to "dig up" . None of the fossil peices I received were sharp and didnt have any issues with anything breaking as hes pretty heavy handed. He sat at the table playing for an hour, unbothered. Really easy to clean up as well.
customer_reviews.author: anthony r.

customer_reviews.title: Clumped dry sand
customer_reviews.text: You open it and think it’s adorable but then you get dried clumped sand (which the box says it doesn’t dry out). Well that’s a lie! Thank goodness my son still loves it but I don’t recommend buying this. Not worth the money
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fun, tactile play
customer_reviews.text: My 2 1/2 year old grandson loves playing with this with me. He won't keep the sand in the box, though. He likes the dinosaurs and the molds.
customer_reviews.author: Plainville

customer_reviews.title: Nice product
customer_reviews.text: I was happy with this purchase. I bought it for my grandson cause he love dinosaurs. He has had many hours and days of fun. I would say the only downfall is I personally wished there was a little more sand that came with it. I would recommend buying this product.
customer_reviews.author: doogie

customer_reviews.title: Math lesson
customer_reviews.text: I purchased the set for my preschool classroom to use with a building blocks activity
customer_reviews.author: Celia

customer_reviews.title: Great buy!
customer_reviews.text: Super cool! Bought this for my 3 year old for his birthday and he’s obsessed with it. He loves the dinosaurs and all the forms it comes with! Definitely recommended for a little one that’s obsessed with dinosaurs!
customer_reviews.author: Madison Wheeler

customer_reviews.title: Great sand, o.k. Dinosaurs.
customer_reviews.text: The kinetic sand is wonderful. Our grandchildren really enjoyed playing with it and it is so easy to clean up! The little dinosaurs were tiny and cheaply made, I have attached a photo of the larger one arriving crushed and broken. The kit comes with little molds which work ok. I am glad I bought an additional bag of sand because the kits sand does not fill the box. It could use some improvements and become better than what it is.
customer_reviews.author: CAROL J

customer_reviews.title: Sand
customer_reviews.text: My grandson loves looking for the dinosaurs that are in the sand ,the sand is great don’t make a big mess easy to clean up.
customer_reviews.author: Donna McNeal

customer_reviews.title: Good product but not for my son
customer_reviews.text: The product itself is great just that my 3 year old is not as interested as I thought. His engagement with it is minimal. The best thing he likes is the fossils of triceratops; however, it is so easy to break and the size of the pieces are just too small. I know he would engage more if he can put all pieces of the fossil together and actually form a triceratops which he loves the most.
customer_reviews.author: Y.H

customer_reviews.title: This was a fantastic buy! My son loves it and plays with ...
customer_reviews.text: This was a fantastic buy! My son loves it and plays with it constantly for hours. It is easy to clean up, and keeps him amused for hours. I would definitely buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Samantha H. Breslin

customer_reviews.title: It’s good, but broken
customer_reviews.text: It’s super cute and my nephews love to play with it. However, when it was received a few of the peices arrived broken. We had to throw them out or the would have gotten hurt. Other than that they love to play with the sand. I see a lot of people saying that the sand was hard, it states in the instructions that if the sand gets hard, just spray it with a little water, and it works! The sand doesn’t dry out.
customer_reviews.author: Casey

customer_reviews.title: Easy to clean mess free
customer_reviews.text: Great toy we have been playing for an hour and my daughter doesn’t want to stop it was s toy for her 2 year old brother he likes it too but she loves it. It’s nice alternative to slime she loves slime.,
customer_reviews.author: Aleksandra

customer_reviews.title: Great, fun, easy cleaning
customer_reviews.text: I really like the product. It's fun, my son loves it and it's relatively easy to clean up. Only critique I have is to make the packaging more professional looking. As a developer I can tell you that less is more when it comes to good product design (I know it's just the box, but the details matter!). Besides that this stuff is awesome!!
customer_reviews.author: Bryan Mudge

customer_reviews.title: Lots of fun
customer_reviews.text: My three-year-old and five-year-old grandchildren loved the sand and dinosaurs. It came with lots of things for the kids to play with and was a great value
customer_reviews.author: Rosemary

customer_reviews.title: Arrived broken.
customer_reviews.text: Most of the plastic Dino pieces arrived broke. My son opened the box to play with it on his birthday and discovered the broken pieces.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: Not worth what i pay
customer_reviews.text: The actual product was very different like it looks in picture! Not a good tray it was cardboard box tray! the amount of sand was little not at all worth what i paid the dinosaur pieces were broken
customer_reviews.author: Madhu

customer_reviews.title: We love this kit!
customer_reviews.text: My son with some special needs loves this. It is one of the few toys he will stay focused and play with for more than 5 min. I love that the sand is contained also.
customer_reviews.author: KMM78

product_meta.title: CoolSand 3D Sandbox - Dino Discovery Edition - Set Includes: 1 Pound Moldable Indoor Play Sand, Shaping Molds, Dinosaur Figures and 3D Tray
feature_bullets: Cool sand is moldable meaning it sticks only to itself and not to you or your clothes. For those who can't get enough cool sand; We're offering refill buckets for even more creative fun. Stretch it, Mold it and watch it flow through your fingers. Our sand never dries out for hours of creative play. Package includes 1.1 lbs. Of cool sand, 10 shaping molds, 12 sea creature figures, and the packaging doubles as a sandbox.
Packaging doubles as a sandbox measuring 9.5" X 11" X 2" (Lxwxh) for easy clean-up and storage for the sand and included molds!

Bring home the beach without the mess! You have to touch it to believe it, cool sand feels like wet beach sand but won’t stick to anything but itself. Plus it holds its shape. That means no sand on your hands, in your hair or in your bag. It leaves your hands completely dry and never greasy.

Get creative with cool sand! With our included sandbox (packaging or inflatable) the possibilities are only Limited By your imagination. Cool sand stimulates creativity in children and adults alike. It can be packed into molds or shaped alone. You'll want to bring some to work and play with it on your desk. Surprisingly stress relieving; you have to feel it to understand why everyone loves cool sand.
Cool sand is for ages 3 and up because the plastic mold pieces pose a choking HAZARD. Cool sand is 100% non-toxic.
